message.name: ERR_XFV_END_DATE_BEFORE_START_DATE
message.locale: Start Date must not be later than the End Date.

message.name: ERR_XFV_START_DATE_BEFORE_TODAY
message.locale: Start Date must not be earlier than today.

message.name: ERR_RV_RECORD_CANCELLED
message.locale: This issue has been canceled and cannot be modified.
This issue has been cancelled and cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_RV_RECORD_ALREADY_CANCELLED
message.locale: This issue has already been canceled.
This issue has already been cancelled.

message.name: ERR_XRV_ISSUE_PERIOD_OVERLAPS
message.locale: The period of this issue overlaps with that of an existing active issue.

message.name: ERR_FV_HOME_PAGE_IDENTIFIER_EMPTY
message.locale: Home Page Identifier must be entered.

message.name: ERR_XRV_NO_ISSUE_TYPE_CONFIGURED
message.locale: Issue Types must be configured in administration before an issue can be created. Please contact an administrator.
